effects.effect: The eye has an affinity for one of the following damage types cold, fire, or lightning. The chosen type determines the eye's damage immunity and the damage dealt by their abilities.

effects.tier1: 6 damage; push 2, or the eye shifts up to 2 squares away from the target
effects.tier2: 9 damage; slide 4, or the eye shifts up to 4 squares away from the target
effects.tier3: 12 damage; slide 6, or the eye shifts up to 6 squares away from the target

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: This ability deals cold, fire, or lightning damage.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: This ability deals cold, fire, or lightning damage, and any enemy targeted by the ability has damage weakness 3 to the same damage type (save ends).
If the eye is reduced to 0 Stamina, they can make a free strike before dying. If the target of the free strike is reduced to 0 Stamina, the eye is reduced to 1 Stamina instead.
